product_name: The North Face Brooklyn Down Jacket - Women's
long_description: Turn your trudge into a two-step on cold, wet days in the waterproof, breathable Brooklyn down jacket from The North Face. A media pocket with cord port lets you listen to your tunes along the way. Shell is waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) 2-layer nylon for excellent weather protection. Jacket is insulated with 550-fill-power down for warmth that's lightweight and compressible. Quilted lining feels cozy; detachable faux fur on the hood lets you customize the look. Self-fabric belt features a metal logo buckle. Inner fleece cuffs snug in warmth. The North Face Brooklyn down jacket for women features zippered chest and hand pockets.
short_description: Turn your trudge into a two-step on cold, wet days in the waterproof, breathable Brooklyn down jacket from The North Face. A media pocket with cord port lets you listen to your tunes along the way.
